message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $15,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me than that. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I appreciate your valuation of the product, but I still believe it's worth less to me. My maximum willingness to pay remains at $15,000.
